name: System Resource Monitor
command: echo 'CPU Usage:' && top -bn1 | grep 'Cpu(s)' | sed 's/.*, *\([0-9.]*\)%* id.*/\1/' | awk '{print 100 - $1"%"'} && echo 'Memory Usage:' && free | grep Mem | awk '{printf "%.2f%%", $3/$2 * 100.0}' && echo 'Disk Usage:' && df -h / | awk 'NR==2 {print $5}'
description: Monitor system resources (CPU, Memory, Disk) - Generated by ScripGen
